abstract: After a rash of recent missteps, I am compelled once again to point out that “who” should be used as the subject of a verb and “whom” as an object.

headline.main: The Case of Who v. Whom

snippet: After a rash of recent missteps, I am compelled once again to point out that “who” should be used as the subject of a verb and “whom” as an object.
